about.l: CashitOut App allows you to transfer your google play balance to PayTM wallet or UPI linked bank account.
To convert play credits you need to :-

1) Purchase a token via play balance in <Tokens> section of the app (if you choose any other payment mode such as debit/credit card then we are not responsible for your loss as you will get only defined percentage of the Token amount).
3) You can View your purchased token in <My Tokens> Section of the app.
You will also receive an automated confirmation mail from Cash It Out containing the purchased token details.
If the token is not shown in My Tokens Section but play balance was deducted from your account then you can contact us by submitting the form provided in <Assistance> section of the app.
Minimum Payout/Conversion : You can convert/redeem minimum 5 INR.
Google charges 30% and we take 6%-50% (Depends on Range of Tokens) of the total conversion amount.
For Example, If you want to convert 100 INR then google will charge 30 INR (30%) and we charge 10 INR (10%).
Time: Usually it takes less than 72 hours to credit the converted amount to your account from the date of conversion request/order.
Wrong payout detail may cause delay in payout until you raise query.
Note: We are not responsible for the wrong details submitted by user.
Make sure you have entered the payout details correctly.
